title: Hexo 源码
content:
项目依赖

#  tree -L 2 -I .pnpm
.
├── hexo -> .pnpm/hexo@6.2.0/node_modules/hexo
├── hexo-browsersync -> .pnpm/hexo-browsersync@0.3.0/node_modules/hexo-browsersync
├── hexo-deployer-git -> .pnpm/hexo-deployer-git@3.0.0/node_modules/hexo-deployer-git
├── hexo-generator-archive -> .pnpm/hexo-generator-archive@1.0.0/node_modules/hexo-generator-archive
├── hexo-generator-category -> .pnpm/hexo-generator-category@1.0.0/node_modules/hexo-generator-category
├── hexo-generator-index -> .pnpm/hexo-generator-index@2.0.0/node_modules/hexo-generator-index
├── hexo-generator-search -> .pnpm/hexo-generator-search@2.4.3/node_modules/hexo-generator-search
├── hexo-generator-tag -> .pnpm/hexo-generator-tag@1.0.0/node_modules/hexo-generator-tag
├── hexo-renderer-ejs -> .pnpm/hexo-renderer-ejs@2.0.0/node_modules/hexo-renderer-ejs
├── hexo-renderer-marked -> .pnpm/hexo-renderer-marked@5.0.0/node_modules/hexo-renderer-marked
├── hexo-renderer-stylus -> .pnpm/hexo-renderer-stylus@2.1.0/node_modules/hexo-renderer-stylus
├── hexo-server -> .pnpm/hexo-server@3.0.0/node_modules/hexo-server
├── hexo-theme-aurora -> .pnpm/hexo-theme-aurora@1.5.5/node_modules/hexo-theme-aurora
├── hexo-theme-landscape -> .pnpm/hexo-theme-landscape@0.0.3/node_modules/hexo-theme-landscape
└── patch-package -> .pnpm/patch-package@6.4.7/node_modules/patch-package

prev_post.title: vscode 常用快捷键（持续更新...）
prev_post.text: 直接换行cmd + enter; 选中多个相同的元素cmd + d; // 每次向后多选一个相同的 选中相同内容cmd + shift + L; // 全文，选相同内容 多位置同时编辑cmd + 点击; 选择一块内容cmd + shift ...

next_post.text: 取消请求在网上胡乱翻翻，无意中又翻到 MDN 看到了 AbortControllerAbortController 接口表示一个控制器对象，允许你根据需要中止一个或多个 Web 请求。 构造函数 AbortController.AbortController(); /&...
